annotations.description:
Provides a MariaDB database on RHEL 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/mariadb-container/tree/master/10.2/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of MariaDB available on OpenShift, including major version updates.

Provides a MariaDB 10.2 database on RHEL 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/mariadb-container/tree/master/10.2/README.md.
